testimonial.name: testimonial
testimonial.label: Testimonial
testimonial.title: What Travelers Say About TravelTang
testimonial.description: Hear from international travelers who used TravelTang for their China adventures.

items.title: Sarah Johnson
items.label: First-time Visitor from USA
items.description: TravelTang's payment setup guide was a lifesaver! I set up Alipay in minutes and could pay everywhere. The city guides helped me discover amazing places I would have missed.

items.title: Michael Chen
items.label: Business Traveler from UK
items.description: The AI assistant answered all my questions instantly, even at 2 AM! It's like having a local guide in my pocket. Worth every penny.

items.title: Emma Williams
items.label: Solo Traveler from Australia
items.description: As a solo female traveler, I felt so much more confident with TravelTang. The guides covered everything from transportation to safety tips. Highly recommend!

items.title: David Kim
items.label: Family Traveler from Canada
items.description: Traveling with kids in China can be challenging, but TravelTang's guides made it so much easier. We found family-friendly restaurants and activities we never would have known about.

items.title: Lisa Anderson
items.label: Student from Germany
items.description: The PDF guides are perfect for offline access. I downloaded them before my trip and could reference them even without internet. The AI assistant helped me navigate the subway system like a pro!

items.title: Robert Taylor
items.label: Adventure Traveler from New Zealand
items.description: TravelTang helped me explore beyond the tourist traps. The city guides showed me authentic local experiences, and the AI assistant gave me real-time advice on weather and local customs.

faq.name: faq
faq.label: FAQ
faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions About TravelTang
faq.description: Have another question? Contact us by email or use our AI assistant.

items.title: What is TravelTang and how can it help me?
items.description: TravelTang is a comprehensive travel guide service for international visitors to China. We provide detailed PDF guides for payment setup and city travel, plus a 24/7 AI-powered travel assistant to answer your questions instantly.

items.title: Do I need to speak Chinese to use TravelTang?
items.description: Not at all! TravelTang is designed for international travelers. Our guides are available in English and Chinese, and our AI assistant can communicate in multiple languages to help you navigate China with confidence.

items.title: What payment methods are covered in the guides?
items.description: Our payment setup guide covers both Alipay and WeChat Pay, the two most popular mobile payment methods in China. We provide step-by-step instructions to help you set up and use these payment methods as an international visitor.

items.title: How accurate and up-to-date are the travel guides?
items.description: Our guides are regularly updated with the latest information about attractions, restaurants, transportation, and travel tips. We monitor changes in China's travel landscape and update our content accordingly to ensure accuracy.

items.title: Can I use the AI assistant offline?
items.description: The AI assistant requires an internet connection to function. However, our PDF guides can be downloaded and accessed offline, so you can reference them anytime, anywhere during your trip.

items.title: What cities are covered in the travel guides?
items.description: Our city guides currently cover major tourist destinations including Beijing, Shanghai, Xi'an, and more. We're constantly adding new cities based on traveler demand. Check our guides page for the complete list.
